name: What Must Be Done
description:
Knowing what must be done, you venture into the dungeon to start collecting the resources necessary. Who knows where this path will lead...

GOAL:

Go through the dungeon, killing the monsters and collecting resources in order to do what must be done in the research screen. Along the way you will need to upgrade your stats and weapons in order to get the needed materials.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse - Attack

Shift - Dash

X - Hide/Show stats during Dungeon

Game Tips:

- There are two types of upgrades, temporary upgrades you pickup during the dungeon, and permanent upgrades you get in the research screen. The temp upgrades will only stick around during your dungeon run but the research upgrades will be with you forever.

- There are two upgrade menus in the research screen! Be sure to click "Swap to stats" or "Swap to weapon"

- The first level of a weapon upgrade unlocks that weapon, but each subsequent level increases the damage
